text: Need Rowan Bailey for Portmans campaign. Budget around $24,903, looking for 2 x LinkedIn post, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Facebook post, 3 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Instagram story. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
